name: Thirty institutions reporting the most FY 2019 research space in all fields: FYs 2015 to 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_rank
variableMeasured.unitText: Net assignable square feet in thousands

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Totals for the leading 30 institutions reflect the institutions in the top 30 for that given year. Some institutions in the FY 2017 ranking were not in the top 30 prior in FY 2015. Some institutions in the FY 2019 ranking were not in the top 30 prior to FY 2019. Details may not add to totals due to rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Science and Engineering Research Facilities.
